amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being made available for the one-time special educational, professional, and cultural exchange grants program, reducing the cost of the bill by $8 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 111-193 to prohibit funds in the bill from being made available for the one-time special educational, professional, and cultural exchange grants program, reducing the cost of the bill by $8 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 268 (Roll no. 522).
